mapper.insert: insert into ihub_order_t ( order_number, creation_date, customer_id, customer_name, order_amount, delivery_location, delivery_date, last_update_date, last_updated_by, created_by, description ) values ( #{orderNumber}, #{creationDate}, #{customerId}, #{customerName}, #{orderAmount}, #{deliveryLoc}, #{deliveryDate}, sysdate(), #{customerId}, #{customerId}, null )
mapper.select: select tt.order_id as orderId, tt.customer_id as customerId, tt.created_by as createdBy, tt.creation_date creationDate, tt.customer_name as customerName, tt.delivery_date as deliveryDate, tt.delivery_location as deliveryLoc, tt.order_amount as orderAmount, tt.order_number as orderNumber from ihub.ihub_order_t tt where tt.customer_id = #{customerId}
